price: 44. Markaasaan soo dirnay Rusushayada oo is raacsan, mar kastoo uu u yimaado ummad Rasuulkeedu way beeniyaan, kolkaasaan ka yeellay qaarba inay raacaan qaar kale (halaagnay), oo ka dhignay wax lagu sheekeysto. Ee meel daran ha ka dhaceen qolodaan (Xaqa) rumeyn.
arabic: ثُمَّ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُلَنَا تَتۡرَاۖ كُلَّ مَا جَآءَ أُمَّةٗ رَّسُولُهَا كَذَّبُوهُۖ فَأَتۡبَعۡنَا بَعۡضَهُم بَعۡضٗا وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ أَحَادِيثَۚ فَبُعۡدٗا لِّقَوۡمٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma arsalnā rusulanā tatrā kulla mā jāa ummatan rasūluhā kadhabūhu fa-atbaʿnā baʿḍahum baʿḍan wajaʿalnāhum aḥādītha fabuʿ'dan liqawmin lā yu'minūna
